javelin.controller.generator.feature

Class FeatureGeneration

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.controller.generator.feature.FeatureGeneration

  • public class FeatureGeneration
extends java.lang.Object
    One of these per feature.
    Author:
    alex
    See Also:
    FeatureGenerator.spawn(float, boolean)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean absolute
      If true then chance won't be altered by FeatureGenerator.convertchances().
      float chance
      When instantiated this is the relative chance of this feature being spawned.
      java.lang.Integer max
      If not null won't spawn any more of these feature if there maximum allowerd number per World has been reached already.
      java.lang.Integer seeds
      The starting number of instances of this feature to generate on the world map.
      boolean starting
      If true this feature will be eligible for instantiation both during World generation and during normal gameplay.

    • Field Detail

      • chance

        public float chance
        When instantiated this is the relative chance of this feature being spawned. This is later modified by

      • absolute

        public boolean absolute
        If true then chance won't be altered by FeatureGenerator.convertchances().

      • starting

        public boolean starting
        If true this feature will be eligible for instantiation both during World generation and during normal gameplay. If false will only be spawned during normal gameplay.

      • max

        public java.lang.Integer max
        If not null won't spawn any more of these feature if there maximum allowerd number per World has been reached already.

      • seeds

        public java.lang.Integer seeds
        The starting number of instances of this feature to generate on the world map.
